appearances.title: U.S. House of Representatives U.S. House of Representatives : CSPAN : January 12, 2026 11:59am-12:26pm EST
appearances.snippet: john joyce, for five minutes. >> thank you, mr. speaker. last week, president trump issued an executive order to prioritize the development of the us warfighter. president trump has made significant strides to strengthen the us military capabilities, and this executive order continues to do just that, enhancing the lethality and readiness of our military forces relies on the highly skilled practices of defense contracting partners. partners like jlg industries, volvo construction equipment, the manitowoc company, and firms like lockheed martin, leonardo, drs, kongsberg defense corporation and j-w defense systems. these are all examples of companies that put our nation's vital interests first. these are all companies that are in pennsylvania's 13th congressional district. president trump's initiative will hold defense to the highest standards by refocusing on our nation's military readiness, especially needed in these incredibly dangerous times. thank you, president trump. thank you. mr. speaker. i rise today to acknowledge the efforts of th

appearances.title: U.S. House of Representatives U.S. House of Representatives : CSPAN : January 8, 2026 10:00am-11:50am EST
appearances.snippet: december the 18th on his farm in rockbridge, where he grew up and lived with his beloved wife, carolyn john joyce. leonard hunt for 67 years. our governor and first lady shared a deep, deep partnership built on love and friendship. he took great pride in his children's accomplishments and especially seeing his daughter rachel follow in his footsteps as our lieutenant governor. carolyn, rebecca baxter, rachel and elizabeth, our hearts are with you. north carolina will miss one of its greatest public servants. his family will miss a beloved husband, brother robert, father and grandfather. and i will personally miss a dear friend. i yield back. >> the gentleman from north carolina yields. the chair now recognizes the lady from michigan, miss tlaib, for five minutes. >> i want to take a moment to honor the extraordinary life and legacy of mother peggy noble. she was an inspirational leader and a champion for economic justice and for working families. mother, peggy. peggy has dedicated her life to college park neighborhood where she lived. she was a community organizer, supporting her neighbors, advoc
